item.title: A summer weekend
item.description: This weekend, I am setting up this blog with Hugo and I love it! It’s freakishly fast. TODOS: Fix Google recaptcha for comments Staticman on heroku setup add reading time add some social buttons bottom Build a toml prettifier with node.js
